subject: Bug: Tasks disappearing after sync
body:
TaskFlow Team,

We're experiencing a critical bug. When users sync tasks across devices, some tasks are disappearing completely.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a task on desktop
2. Add subtasks and attachments
3. Sync to mobile app
4. Make edits on mobile
5. Sync back to desktop
6. Some tasks are now missing

This has happened to 3 users in the past 2 days. We're on version 2.4.1.

Is this a known issue? We need this fixed urgently.

Error logs attached (screenshot in previous email).

Mark Thompson
IT Administrator
